text: 12:12 Rom 15:19Kɨ ian tongɨn ikia bizir bar avɨribagh ami, egha kamaghɨn uabɨ ian aka, kɨ guizɨn Aposel. Kɨ tugha gavgavigha osɨmtɨziba atera, mirakelɨn avɨriba, ko dɨgavir kuram gamir araziba, ko Godɨn gavgavim itir ingangariba, ian tongɨn dagh ami. Ezɨ bizir kaba kamaghɨn nan ian akazɨ ia fo, kɨ Godɨn ingangarim gami.
